name: YFIBusiness.Finance (YFIB)
short_description:
A DeFi powerhouse at the center of the hottest trend in the crypto industry. YFIB is a DeFi farmland that yield (returns) on the capital that you stake. The returns vary from one protocol to the next. YFIB automates & optimizes staking such that you can earn maximum return on your capital without having to worry about circumstances.
$YFIB Token is used by yfibusiness.finance as a tool in producing returns from farming deposits. Depositors earn minted portion of $YFIB Token as a return on their deposited capital.
The increase in deposits is meant to increase the value of $YFIB which is the native Token of yfibusiness.finance ecosystem.
